name: Writing Subject Lines
description: Write irresistible subject lines in seconds.

nodes.name: llm
nodes.title: Answers
nodes.description: Answer a question using a large language model. Chat history can be used to maintain context between messages.

input_config.human_message: Write 10 attention-grabbing subject lines for type of email for product name {{product}} and description focusing on target audience, based on information{{type}} {{target_audience}} {{keywords}} {{product}} {{tone}}. The subject lines should be no longer than 8 words.

tone.title: Desired Tone (Optional)
tone.description: Describe the desired feeling you want to evoke with the subject line (e.g., urgency, curiosity, excitement).

type.title: Email Type
type.description: Briefly describe the type of email the subject line is for (e.g., promotional offer, welcome email, event reminder).

keywords.title: Keywords (Optional)
keywords.description: Include relevant keywords that capture the essence of your email content.

ui_metadata.value: Welcome, Exclusive Offer, Get Started  pen_spark

target_audience.title: Target Audience
target_audience.description: Specify who the email is going to (e.g., existing customers, potential leads, specific demographics).

ui_metadata.value: New customers who have recently signed up for an account.  pen_spark
